s.text: If Gore tried that on Bradley during their next debate, I think we might all see him a little differently.)

King World executive Andy Friendly is quoted as saying, "We've lightened up the show with a new backdrop and more female-oriented material."

King World executive Andy Friendly is quoted as saying, "We've lightened up the show with a new backdrop and more female-oriented material."

In my opinion, the proper route to appearing more alpha is not earth tones, as suggested, but would be for him to wear a leather jacket, suck on a cigarette butt, and make a bunch of appointments to meet with women's groups that he suddenly cancels at the very last second without offering an explanation.
